thread.title: BRIEF-Silverhawk Realty Joins Berkshire Hathaway Homeservices

title: BRIEF-Silverhawk Realty Joins Berkshire Hathaway Homeservices

organizations.name: brief-silverhawk realty joins berkshire hathaway homeserv
brief-silverhawk realty joins berkshire hathaway homeservices

text:
January 23, 2018 / 2:11 PM / in 14 minutes BRIEF-Silverhawk Realty Joins Berkshire Hathaway Homeservices Reuters Staff 
Jan 23 (Reuters) - Berkshire Hathaway Inc: * SILVERHAWK REALTY JOINS BERKSHIRE HATHAWAY HOMESERVICES 
* BERKSHIRE HATHAWAY HOMESERVICES -INDEPENDENT BROKERAGE SILVERHAWK REALTY JOINED NETWORK OPERATING AS BERKSHIRE HATHAWAY HOMESERVICES SILVERHAWK REALTY Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
